item.description:
Where: on the PHONE
( you just pay for the long distance call )

** Phone # & materials will be sent to you
after you RSVP : YES"

Meeting Description:
"Chime in" from 9 - 10 pm on the phone ...

- with your questions
- to get support and suggestions
- to share your LOA experiences

Stefan Pagacik, facilitator of September's meetup, is on the call too. Stefan is here to answer any straggler questions & to help members further use the 2 processes more effectively (discussed at our September In-Person Meetup this past Tuesday).

**Also, for folks who were at the meetup on Tuesday:
If you want us to mastermind with you to get suggestions of "inspired actions" you can take
re: what you "Nevillized", join us on the call.

These 2 processes have helped Stefan use the Law of Attraction more consistently towards manifesting his huge dreams. These processes are taught by Dr. Joe Vitale, another teacher featured in “The Secret”.

The processes respectively relate to Ho’Oponopono and a Cleaning and Clearing Method. They help you identify, isolate, and eliminate counter-intentions that are currently attracting undesired results into your life.

Thank you very much, Stefan ( www.greenpointma.com ), for being available for our members this evening.

To review details of September 9th Meetup agenda:
http://lawofattractio...


================

Do check our Message Board for info/ discussions from members. You're welcome to post LOA-related topics/ discussions there too.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: BostonLOA TELE-Meetup: LOA Masterminding
